Description: Displays a list of all available commands with descriptions.
LLM_Context: The 'commands' command provides a summary of all bot commands and their functionalities to help users understand available features.

Description: Provides more detail into using {BOT_NAME} commands
LLM_Context: The !explain command is used to provide users the functionality of each server command and how to properly use it.

Description: Starts a private chat with {BOT_NAME} to help with commands.
LLM_Context: The 'command_help' command allows users to chat with {BOT_NAME} in a private chat under Tickets / Support. Its important for users to use the `bye` command to end the interaction.

Description: Closes your private help channel with Devros.
LLM_Context: The 'bye' command terminates the user's private help session with {BOT_NAME}, ending the ongoing interaction. If a user dosen't use the `bye` command the conversation will automatically be deleted 1 hour after the last message was sent.

Description: Ask {BOT_NAME} a question and receive an AI generated response.
LLM_Context: The 'ask' command sends a user's question to an AI server and returns a natural language response generated by {BOT_NAME}. Server members can ask any question they would ask any other AI chat bot.

Description: Sends a game invite to the general chat to encourage other server members to join.
LLM_Context: The 'invite' command generates a game invitation embed in the general chat, facilitating multiplayer game sessions by notifying the selected user.

Description: Provides a list of all available dice members can roll
LLM_Context: Provides a list of all available dice server members can roll. Dice include a d4, d6, d12, and d20 dice and this command just lists them all.
The `d4` command rolls a 4 sided dice and presents the outcome through an embeded message in the channel the user used the command in.
The `roll` command rolls a 6 sided dice and presents the outcome through an embeded message in the channel the user used the command in.
The `d8` command rolls an 8 sided dice and presents the outcome through an embeded message in the channel the user used the command in.
The `d10` command rolls a 10 sided dice and presents the outcome through an embeded message in the channel the user used the command in.
The `d12` command rolls a 12 sided dice and presents the outcome through an embeded message in the channel the user used the command in.
The `d20` command rolls a 20 sided dice and presents the outcome through an embeded message in the channel the user used the command in.

Description: Checks your available server economy balance

LLM_Context: The `leaderboard` command sends a detailed embed to the channel it was used in displaying the top 10 members with the highest balance in the servers economy, in decending order.
